visual_description.scene: Two glass test tubes with plasma close-up on dark background, illuminated from the side
visual_description.view: frontal, lower part of test tubes

plasma.notes: A large irregularly shaped gelatinous clot is visible in the left test tube. The right test tube has more homogeneous plasma, but slight turbidity is also visible

visual_description.scene: Two glass test tubes with plasma, vertical, on gray background
visual_description.view: frontal, full length of test tubes

plasma.notes: Rounded gelatinous clots visible in both test tubes. Left test tube (19.7.1) -- clot is compact, closer to the bottom. Right (21.7.1) -- clot is larger, positioned slightly higher. Plasma volume is small

visual_description.scene: One glass test tube with plasma, held vertically, laboratory setting in background
visual_description.view: frontal, lower part of test tube

plasma.notes: Large dense irregularly shaped clot visible in lower part of test tube. Small bubbles and condensation drops noticeable on test tube walls

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma close-up, tilted, against backlighting
visual_description.view: macro, side view at an angle

plasma.notes: Large gelatinous clot occupies significant portion of volume. Clot is heterogeneous, with darker center and lighter edges. Gelatinous texture is clearly visible

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma, horizontal position, macro photography against backlighting
visual_description.view: macro, side view, horizontal

plasma.notes: Large gelatinous clot with uneven contours. Wavy texture visible inside clot. Clot occupies main volume of plasma

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma, slightly tilted, on black-and-white backlighting background
visual_description.view: frontal with slight tilt

plasma.notes: Rounded clot visible in middle part of test tube. Pipette visible next to test tube. Clot is compact, clearly stands out against transparent plasma

visual_description.scene: Top view into plasma test tube, macro photography
visual_description.view: top view, into test tube

plasma.notes: Clot visible on plasma surface. Heterogeneous structure visible through glass. One small air bubble on surface

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma, held vertically by hand, laboratory setting in background
visual_description.view: frontal, lower part of test tube

plasma.notes: Large dense clot visible inside plasma. Plasma is bright yellow. Small light area visible at bottom of test tube -- possibly sedimentation

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma in horizontal position, against backlighting
visual_description.view: side, horizontal, macro

plasma.notes: Compact rounded clot visible in center of volume. Plasma surrounds the clot, clear boundary between clot and liquid part is visible

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma, close-up view through glass, backlighting from behind
visual_description.view: macro, frontal through glass

plasma.notes: Large oval-shaped clot, occupies most of visible volume. Uneven meniscus line visible in upper part. Clot has heterogeneous texture

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma, held vertically, laboratory equipment in background
visual_description.view: frontal, lower part of test tube

plasma.notes: Large dense clot visible inside yellow plasma. Wires and electronic equipment visible in background. Plasma has saturated color, clot is clearly defined

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma, macro photography through glass, backlighting from behind
visual_description.view: macro, frontal

plasma.notes: Large rounded clot in center of test tube. Clot texture is slightly heterogeneous with turbid areas. Surrounding plasma is lighter than clot

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma in horizontal position, macro photography
visual_description.view: macro, side, horizontal

plasma.notes: Rounded gelatinous clot shifted to one edge. Clot texture is heterogeneous -- darker areas visible. Clear clot boundary visible

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma, held tilted by hand, against backlighting. Marking visible on test tube
visual_description.view: frontal, middle part of test tube

plasma.notes: Rounded clot visible in middle part of test tube. Handwritten marking visible on glass. Plasma is pale, clot is compact

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma, vertical, laboratory setting in background
visual_description.view: frontal, lower part of test tube

plasma.notes: Plasma is bright yellow, homogeneous, without visible clots. Fill level about one third of test tube. Clear meniscus boundary visible

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma in horizontal position, macro photography through glass
visual_description.view: macro, side, horizontal

plasma.notes: Clot visible in center of plasma volume. Clot center darker than edges. Plasma partially fills test tube

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma tilted, against backlighting
visual_description.view: side, at an angle, middle part of test tube

plasma.notes: Rounded clot visible in lower part of tilted test tube. Small plasma volume. Clot is yellowish-brownish in center

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma, held vertically, laboratory setting in background
visual_description.view: frontal, lower part of test tube

plasma.notes: Large gelatinous clot visible in plasma. Plasma is yellow. Bubbles on surface

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma, held vertically by hand, laboratory equipment in background
visual_description.view: frontal, lower part of test tube

plasma.notes: Large clot visible inside plasma. Plasma is yellow with noticeable turbidity

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma against backlighting, vertical position
visual_description.view: frontal, middle part of test tube

plasma.notes: Clot with uneven contours visible in middle part of test tube. Small bubbles on walls. Plasma volume is small

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma, held vertically, laboratory equipment and wires in background
visual_description.view: frontal, lower part of test tube

plasma.notes: Plasma is bright yellow, visually homogeneous. Fill level about one third of test tube. Wires and electronic equipment visible in background

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma in horizontal position, macro photography through glass with backlighting
visual_description.view: macro, side, horizontal

plasma.notes: Clot with thin fibrous structure visible. Thread-like formations visible inside clot. Central part darker than edges

visual_description.scene: Test tube with plasma in horizontal position, macro photography against backlighting
visual_description.view: macro, side, horizontal

plasma.notes: Irregularly shaped clot with wavy contours visible. Small bubbles on liquid surface. Clot texture is heterogeneous

visual_description.scene: Three test tubes with plasma, held vertically by hand, against backlighting
visual_description.view: frontal, bottom part of test tubes, from below

plasma.notes: Clots visible in all three test tubes. Left -- clot is compact. Middle -- clot is larger, with darker center. Right -- clot is lighter and more diffuse. Plasma volume varies

visual_description.scene: Three test tubes with plasma, held vertically by hand, against backlighting
visual_description.view: frontal, lower part of test tubes

plasma.notes: Clots visible in all three test tubes. Marking visible on middle test tube. Clots differ in size -- middle is the largest. Right test tube has air bubble near wall

visual_description.scene: Four test tubes with plasma arranged horizontally in pairs (two on top, two on bottom), held by hand, against backlighting
visual_description.view: macro, side, horizontal, pairwise arrangement

plasma.notes: Clots of different sizes visible in all four test tubes. Upper left -- clot is compact. Upper right -- clot is larger. Lower test tubes also contain clots. Air bubble visible near lower right test tube

visual_description.scene: Two test tubes with plasma close-up, bottom part, dark background
visual_description.view: frontal from below, close-up of bottom part

plasma.notes: Both test tubes contain significant plasma volume. Clots visible in both. Plasma has more saturated color compared to earlier photos -- possibly time has passed since irradiation

visual_description.scene: Two test tubes with plasma in horizontal position, one above the other, with backlighting from behind
visual_description.view: side, horizontal, test tubes parallel

plasma.notes: Rounded clots visible in both test tubes. Upper test tube -- clot is brighter and more compact. Lower -- clot is larger and paler. Condensation drops visible on walls

visual_description.scene: Two test tubes with plasma in horizontal position, one above the other, against backlighting
visual_description.view: side, horizontal, macro

plasma.notes: Upper test tube -- clot is compact, rounded, with sharp contours. Lower -- clot is smaller, paler. Difference in clot sizes between test tubes is visible

visual_description.scene: Two test tubes with plasma in horizontal position, one above the other, held by hand, against backlighting
visual_description.view: side, horizontal, macro

plasma.notes: Clots visible in both test tubes. Upper test tube (21) -- clot is larger, rounded, with sharp contours. Lower (19) -- clot is smaller, paler. Difference in clot formation intensity between samples 19 and 21 is visible
